item.title: My First File
item.description: list.addEventListener('click', function (event) { console.log(this) console.log(event.target) if (event.target.classList.contains('delete')) { let li = event.target.parentElement li.remove() } else if (event.target.tagName === 'LABEL') { event.target.classList.toggle('checked') } })
